review:
I met with a small accident recently and my both  forearm bone broken ( literally undisputed movie types ). I went to a very famous hospital and all that i got is plan and packages. 

Through some colleagues i got to kmow about doc Suresh and reached Apollo spectra. The care that he took to me was amazing.

He promised me that my surgery will be pain less and he delivered more than that. It is 4 th week now after the surgery and guess what i am typing with both hands. 

To me he is a saviour. My suggestion to you is please do visit with proper appointment, however if it is emergency he give give priority to you.

Thank you doctor.

Have been suffering with pain for over 8years due to a neuromma in the foot and finally got to consult Dr.Suresh last year.  ****** * ******** ****** *** *** ******* ******* **** *** now I am feeling very much comfortable. Such a down to earth personality he was and a very good listener unlike the doctors you get to meet in big hospitals.

***** ****** * 
Has good experience and listens to the patient problems and explains the reason of the treatment and all the possible options.
I have visited him multiple times and have always found him to be very approachable and committed to his cause.
Highly recommend to all those who are looking for any Ortho treatments!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: He was busy with his phone and or was watching his cctv cameras...he deliberately gets the xrays done **** ****** ***** *** ** *****..he tells you to visir him again in few days . He told me to do feet exercises but they created extrs pain in my feet *** **** ** *** ********* ** ********* *******
reply_text: Thanks for the review. I would like to clarify few of your points. Pain may be because of soft tissue or bony problem. Soft tissue can be relatively diagnosed  clinically and bony problem should be addressed with help of x.rays . Regarding the exercises if the principles of the exercises are not followed then defenitely pain will increase. And I don't think you had come for review again. Regarding later quiry it's your body which has to respond to the treatment not to blame the medicines or the doctor. Me watching cctv camera will be for a purpose and answering a pH call would be for some emergency from hospital Regards Dr Suresh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The appointment time was not maintained. On top of that the doctor was in a hurry and was not interested in listening us out. Even worse was the examination, he was very rough and it was obvious that he was causing more pain. Also, he runs an orthopaedic clinic in the basement which is accessible only by stairs. How are people with joint or leg problems supposed to access easily?
reply_text: Thanks for the review. I really surprised with your comments as every patient is given 15 minutes. More than it's not possible until in emergency. Regarding pain created during examination you are the first person to comment last 20 yr of my practice. Maintaining the time is impossible in any clinics as your previous patients would have taken extra time or some emergency would have had come regarding my clinic functioning at basement  I see people with leg problems who cannot come here at hospital where I work. Regards Dr Suresh

review: I had a very good experience with Dr.Suresh.I have taken my wife, she is having back pain.Sir didn't recommended any tests , gave some medicine and some exercises.That helped us.Since we have  infant baby, sir understood the issue, conveyed in next 4 days didn't reduce first you come alone, don't bring baby and mother I will change the medicine.Good human being.Thanks sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr Suresh for my entire family including my mother and he is the best doctor for orthopedics. It's been many years now. He understands the issue so quickly and is so kind and patient. I feel lucky to have found him when it is so difficult to get a good doctor in the city. He doesn't advertise or sell like others and gives only what is required, nothing more nothing less. Pls don't think twice to book an appt with him :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He was really good. Had Xray in clinic itself which avoided and turn around time. He explained the cray and clarified the problem and recommended treatment. Also explained about options with plaster we could choose from. Over all a good experience and expertise was visible.

This  is  the  first  doctor where  I  visited  for  my  knee  pain . The way  he explained  my problem  related   to muscles  not  by bones  sounds  good  diagnosis.  He  gave  enough  time  to  me. Suggested  some  exercise  and  vitamins  supliments  thats  it.  Over  all  my  experience  was  too  good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

The doctor was quite friendly and explained the issue quite elaborately and made us feel better. ** *** **** ********* ****** *** did not ask to take loads of medicines and do unnecessary X-rays and stuff. review: The only Dr i can trust with my eyes closed. He treats his patients with utmost responsibility and care which is very rare these days.i had two major surgeries earlier in kerala and i was unhappy with my past experiences and I underwent a major foot surgery recently conducted by Suresh sir and the difference was visible instantly, proper analysis for pre op/post op, his expertise in the field and the way he takes care of his patients. I personally felt that he treats his patients like family. I would happily recommend Dr Suresh Kumar M S  for any orthopedic related concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I highly recommend Dr,Suresh Kumar for Ankle and foot related injuries.

I had ankle sprain 3 Years  ago which I neglected as the other doctors told there is nothing wrong with my leg. But over the time I am doing my physical routine and feeling something is moving on fibula I can identify that and cant explain properly to others. When I saw Dr. Suresh Kumar profile I felt his profile is the best suite for my problem. Doctor Identified the problem Immediately by physical examine , but to verify he asked me to go to scan. 

Finally the scan results are same as he told to me. He suggested to  undergo for a surgery. Surgery completed successfully and my heeling is fast, I am recovering well.  These are the his expertise's in giving treatment patients. He is the best in Peroneal Tendon related issues

The best part is he will talk to you very politely , he is calm and listen to your problem. The way he treats to his patients is awesome.

I was having a leg pain.  So went to the clinic thinking its a ortho case .  He diagnosed me. It was not his case but wasted my time and money   due to which my condition worsened .  I had neuro problem due to which I had walking and climbing problem .  He could have referred me if not his case.  And the problem i got when i told him, he told " let it be..  Leave it for sometime".  Is that a doctor supposed to say to your concerns and problems!!!!

I took my friend to doctor. No one was there but still he made us wait for 20 minutes. And while we were telling our problem he was reading message in mobile and didnâ€™t listen properly. The fees mentioned in Practo is 200 but he charged 400. Worst experience!!
reply_text: Mr Deepesh I am really surprised of your comments if you could not pay you should have told me I would have waived off all your charges.  There is a big notice board showing the rate list in the clinic  . Kindly when you To any clinic  kindly enquire the price and then meet the doctor.  Regards

review: ** *** *** ***** ** **** ******** *** he was on phone while checking and said to do warm exercises and come back on weekend  and will see if nail needs to be removed. He didn't ask when it happened? ** *** *** ******* ********* My nail was stamped while playing football some six months back and he when i got home I checked one side of my nail was loose so I lifted and got it cut with nail cutter and I saw there is nail developed below that.
reply_text: Mr Prashob i am a orthopaedician  i take care of bones and joint, i had informed you wait for some time it will fall by itself and regarding the ph i take only emergency calls by patients also you are not qualified enough to judge a doctor .

review:
I had a very good experience with Dr Suresh. I had been suffering from back pain for quite sometime and had been ignoring it . Dr Suresh gave complete attention to my description of the problem and was thorough in his checkup. He recommended me some tests and further physio which thankfully is available in his clinic itself. 
After a few physio sessions, I was very much relieved of the pain I was carrying around for months.
Many thanks to Dr Suresh.

Visited for ankle injury (sprain). Medications helped to reduce the pains and lower the swelling. I now have a soft cast for 2 weeks that would help me recover fully. Doctor is very understanding and explains the patient all the complications better and the remedies too. Recommended for any orthopedic needs. Thanks doctor.
Dr.Suresh was very helpful and explained my condition in detail to me. ** ** **** **** ********** ** *** *****
Very bad body pain from lower leg till Thai, doctor checked me throughly to my satisfaction, doctor was very friendly and was also very genuine
Clear diagnosis explained in simple terms. Dr. Suresh is an extremely competent and experienced doctor who helps allay patient anxieties.
My foot was run over by a truck. I didn't have any hope of restoring my foot. Thanks to Dr Suresh, I am walking with a smile. The care and concern that Dr Suresh provides is beyond words.
Doc was quick enough to know the issue and prescribed me ******** meds , was able to recover soon. Doc was friendly and understanding.

Explains well..
His prescription immediately started showing positive results. My treatment is still going on and I am looking more on to faster recovery and within cost.

Thank u Dr Suresh
I have consulted Dr Suresh for various health issues many time, *** ******** *** ********* ** ***** I strongly recommend him.

*** **** ****** **** * **** **** **** ** ** ***** Very talented, selfless and down to earth person.
He did few surgeries to my dad in a very cost-effective and  best possible way. Hats off to him!

Mr Dev Thanks for your review defenitely we have priority for injury patients children and elderly people . We give minimum of 15-20 min to each patient if you feel you were ignored we are sorry kindly collect  the consultation fees . What you have paid. Regards Dr Suresh

review: He explained us quite pateintly about what flat-foot is and why our daughter doesn't have it. He also told us about the exercised that she can do to improve the arch.
Effective prescription. Not misleading. Careful about patients condinition.Gentle. does not medicate unnecessarily.
Very good experience. Doctor is very friendly and highly knowledgeable. Suggested home remedy instead of going with medication which had good effect. Overall very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor seems to be quite arrogant. I have been advised to do some  exercises for which he shared the videos. When I tried to check the videos there he was like are you a kid to look at them right away. He said look at your ease at home and do the exercises. He can't give much time to patients to resolve their problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: After a long wait time, doctor just came- within 5sec of us explaining fhe problem he derived to the solution and recommended next steps.. Was not hearing us in detail. Was in a hurry *** ***** **** ***** *** ** ********  . Patients are asked to wait in diff waiting rooms and he keeps doing rounds.
Worst experience i had with this doctor, never ever recommend any patient to visit this doctor. Waste of money and time too. Pathetic consultant. Dont waste ur time guys.
Explained the problem very well, has given options for treatment. Took a long time to thoroughly examine and give opinion. Very patient listener.
Doctor is good but appointment did not start on time. Doctor was late and did not arrive even after one hour of scheduled time.  Will not recommend if you value your time.
reply_text: madam before putting this review you should first find where your doctor was delay usually happens if previous patient takes more time with us. regards Dr SURESH

review: Very polite and patient doctor who will listen to your issue, do a detailed analysis and only then would he suggest a treatment, of need be.

Doctor was good in identifying the issue and suggesting right medicine for the treatment. 

Thank you doctor.

This was long pending. ** ***** ** * ********* ****** **** ********* ** ******* Approached him for a back pain. Got immediate relief with his treatment. He is very amiable and friendly. Highly recommended.

I had to come from work and that is precisely why appointments are taken. I have visited the clinic four times and all on previous appointments and every time I have had to wait. Every time. This is so disappointing .
Takes time and listens to the patient. Calm and patient. Good experience on the first visit. Will recommend.

Doctor is very experienced. Listens carefully to every words of patient and explains in a very simple way of what has happened and what needs to be done.

And at the end of the day, they way of giving assurance of recovery was amazing

Experienced and professional Doctor. He diagnosed well and suggested semi rigid cast for easy healing and to walk with full weight bearing. Dr. Suresh did follow up review post cast to check for swelling and pain.Overall very good experience.
He communicated very well and figured out the problem quickly and wrote prescription. He told to take bed rest for 3-4 days. let's see how the treatment goes.
Good and humble doctor. Does not prescribe unnecessary medicines. I recovered in double quick time. Good experience
Most concerned about grabbing fee instead of understand problem ! Had Worst experience with the doctor never go there . Unless you want to end doing surgery for minor problem
Professional and understanding doctor. Listens patiently.  Opts for surgery as a last resort. Had a good experience.

Doctor was friendly and clearly very experienced in ankle surgery & recovery.
His manner inspires confidence and relaxes the patient.

It was good. Doctor gave me good advise and medicines. Feeling relaxed now.
